ValidationRule.description: Country field is mandatory for closing the request
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( AND( NOT( $User.BypassVR__c), ISPICKVAL(Country__c , ""), ISPICKVAL(TECH_Country__c , "") ), OR( ISPICKVAL( Resolution__c , "Immediate Response"), ISPICKVAL( Resolution__c , "Reply Made"), ISPICKVAL( Resolution__c , "Transfer to Store"), ISPICKVAL( Resolution__c , "Sent Catalogue_Brochure_TYC_Invitation"), ISPICKVAL( Resolution__c , "Transfer to Headquarters"), ISPICKVAL( Resolution__c , "No Response Required"), ISPICKVAL( Resolution__c , "Request to Store") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Country field is mandatory for closing the request
